Notes: Singular imperative. Practices the dative pronoun μοι (to me).
ἐλθὲ is an irregular imperative (from erchomai).
Plural imperative. ἀροῦτε is a contract verb form.
ἴσθι is the imperative of 'to be.' Addressed to Demeter.
hypo + Dative = static position resting under.
Accusative plural of irregular noun bous.
